documents.name: Terms & Privacy
documents.text:
Terms of Use

Open-Meteo APIs are free for non-commercial use. We do not restrict access, but ask for fair use.

If your application exceeds 10'000 requests per day, please contact us. We reserve the right to block applications and IP addresses that misuse our service.

Free for non-commercial: You may only use the API services for free for non-commercial purposes as elaborated by creative commons. For further questions, please contact us.

Open-Meteo assumes no responsibility for any inaccuracies or omissions in the data, their availability, or any losses or damages resulting from their usage. The accuracy and completeness of the data products and their uninterrupted provision are not guaranteed by Open-Meteo, and they are provided without any warranty, either statutory or otherwise. In any event, Open-Meteo disclaims all liability under these Terms of Use, whether arising from contract, tort, or any other cause.

Open-Meteo is operated by:

Patrick Zippenfenig
Hintere Schilligmatte 6
6463 Bürglen (UR)
Switzerland

Contact: info@open-meteo.com

Privacy

We do not collect any data from our users, including personal information, usage statistics, or any other data that could be used to identify you. We do not use any cookies or tracking technologies, and we do not share any data with third-party providers.

We do not engage in any advertising or marketing practices that would require us to collect or use any personal information. You can use our website without any concern that your information will be shared with advertisers or marketing agencies.

When you sign up for our newsletter, we collect your email address. We use a secure third-party email marketing platform Substack.com to manage our newsletter. This platform collects information such as your email address and IP address. We use this information solely for the purpose of sending you our newsletter and will not share or sell it with any third-party providers.

We may collect non-personal information, such as your IP address, for technical reasons such as server maintenance, but this information is not linked to your identity in any way.

By using our service, you consent to the terms of our privacy policy and agree that we may collect non-personal information for technical reasons. If you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy, please contact us.
